  physical_appearance: This is a portrait of Florence Yeo. The portrait depicts a woman wearing a kebaya adorned wit diamond brooch. Her hair is pulled back and secured with a pin.

  subject_terms_1: Peranakan kebayas

  subject_terms_2: Photographs Peranakan (Asian people)

  subject_terms_3: Portrait photography Florence Road

  sgcool_label_text: The portrait of Peter Lim Ah Pin depicts a man in a cream-coloured shirt with a simple mandarin collar. The other portrait shows Florence Yeo in a floral kebaya with a set of diamond kerosang made in the Melaka style. Both portraits are coloured photographs
 bear the signature of the same artist and were probably made as a pair. Peter Lim owned a successful bee hoon manufacturing business and was known as the ‘Bee Hoon King’. He also built several markets
 schools and houses. Lim Ah Pin Road and Florence Road were named after the couple
 who owned and rented out several properties in the area.

metadata.title_text: Pair of portraits (Peter Lim Ah Pin and Florence Yeo) Florence Yeo
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a portrait of Florence Yeo. The portrait depicts a woman wearing a kebaya adorned wit diamond brooch. Her hair is pulled back and secured with a pin.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: The portrait of Peter Lim Ah Pin depicts a man in a cream-coloured shirt with a simple mandarin collar. The other portrait shows Florence Yeo in a floral kebaya with a set of diamond kerosang made in the Melaka style. Both portraits are coloured photographs, bear the signature of the same artist and were probably made as a pair. Peter Lim owned a successful bee hoon manufacturing business and was known as the ‘Bee Hoon King’. He also built several markets, schools and houses. Lim Ah Pin Road and Florence Road were named after the couple, who owned and rented out several properties in the area.
